bioconda.name: bioconductor-copa
bioconda.summary: Functions to perform cancer outlier profile analysis.

biotools.summary: Method to find genes that undergo recurrent fusion in a given cancer type by finding pairs of genes that have mutually exclusive outlier profiles.

bioschemas.name: copa
bioschemas.summary: Method to find genes that undergo recurrent fusion in a given cancer type by finding pairs of genes that have mutually exclusive outlier profiles.
